article_node.title: Zhongchao Inc. board approves 2025 equity incentive plan with share limits By Investing
article_node.summary: Zhongchao Inc. announced the approval of its 2025 Equity Incentive Plan, effective August 4, which allows for the issuance of various equity awards to employees and directors, with an initial authorization of 10 million shares. The plan includes an automatic annual increase of 2% of the company's total shares starting January 2026, capped at 50 million shares. As a foreign private issuer, Zhongchao is exempt from certain NASDAQ rules regarding shareholder approval for equity issuances.
